survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from hybrid vehicle owners about their experiences, satisfaction levels, and challenges faced with their vehicles to help manufacturers improve future designs.

questions.question_text: How long have you owned your current hybrid vehicle?
questions.client_notes: This helps segment respondents based on ownership duration.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How long have you owned your current hybrid vehicle?

questions.question_text: What factors influenced your decision to purchase a hybrid vehicle? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allows multiple selections; include an optional open-ended field for 'Other'.
questions.scripter_notes: Use checkbox inputs for multi-choice selection; add a text input if 'Other' is selected.

script.question_text: What factors influenced your decision to purchase a hybrid vehicle? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the fuel efficiency of your hybrid vehicle?
questions.client_notes: Use a standard 5-point Likert scale for consistency.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the fuel efficiency of your hybrid vehicle?

questions.question_text: What challenges, if any, have you faced with your hybrid vehicle?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a text input field for open-ended responses.

script.question_text: What challenges, if any, have you faced with your hybrid vehicle?

questions.question_text: Would you recommend your hybrid vehicle to others?
questions.client_notes: Simple yes/no question to gauge overall satisfaction.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: Would you recommend your hybrid vehicle to others?
